text: The Dangerous Talent is a lostThe Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:The Dangerous Talent 1920 silent film directed by George L. Cox and starring Margarita Fischer and Harry Hilliard. It was released by Pathé Exchange.The AFI Catalog of Feature Films 1893-1993:The Dangerous Talent ==Cast== *Margarita Fischer - Leila Mead *Harry Hilliard - Gilbert Ellis *Beatrice Van - Mildred Shedd *Harvey Clark - Horton *Neil Hardin - Bob Ames *George Periolat - Peyton Dodge *Mae Talbot - A Derelict ==References== ==External links== * The Dangerous Talent at IMDb.com * Category:1920 films Category:American silent feature films Category:Lost American films Category:Pathé Exchange films Category:American films
title: The Dangerous Talent
